title: Elephant Ivory Trade
subtitle: A Tragic Loss
description: Elephants are being hunted for their tusks, fueling the illegal ivory trade. This practice threatens their population and disrupts ecosystems.

title: Tiger Poaching Crisis
subtitle: Endangered Majesty
description: Bengal tigers face extinction due to illegal poaching for their pelts and bones, which are sold in black markets.

title: Bird Smuggling Network
subtitle: The Illegal Cage Trade
description: Thousands of migratory birds are captured and sold illegally as exotic pets, disrupting their natural migration patterns.
